description:
The 2x Video Camera App of the Year just got a WHOLE LOT BETTER!  The iOS 8 version of FiLMiC Pro offers full manual control, motion FX and the world class image processing that beat the $5000 Sony FS100 and tied the $13,000 Canon C300 in blind audience testing at the Zacuto: Revenge of the Great Camera Shoot Out.

Best Video Camera App 2012 - Best App Ever Awards
Best Video Camera App 2011 - TUAW, Editors Pick
Best App Ever finalist - Tap! Magazine
Gizmodo Essential App; 2011, 2012
5 Stars, Editors Review, cnet.com
App of the Week: Time.com/Techland
Editors Choice - Wired, Film Riot, Macworld

FiLMiC Pro turns your iOS camera into a broadcast worthy 2K HD video camera. FiLMiC Pro variable speed zoom, audio gain control, variable frame rates up to 240fps on newest devices. With full manual control over focus, exposure, ISO, shutter speed, tint and color temperature you may never need another video camera again. Additionally, FiLMiC Pro has a ton of professional tools such as audio meters, stereo microphone support, informative thirds guide and aspect ratio overlays. And for the truly creative a variety of resolutions and aspect ratios including 2K, Cinemascope, Letterbox as Super 35 and Super 16 aspect ratios. This app has everything you need to create your own Hollywood movie, documentary, iPhone news story, music video, or travelogue.

New features include:

Fully optimized for iOS8
2K Resolutions
Full Manual Controls for
-Temperature
-Tint
-Exposure
-ISO
-Shutter Speed
-Focus
-Pulling Focus
Unique Hybrid Shooting Modes
New and Improved User Interface
High Powered Action Slider for Live Shooting Adjustments
Support for 240fps on iPhone 6/6+
New Slow and Fast Motion FX options
17:9 Digital Cinema Aspect Ratios
Additional Widescreen and Super 16 Aspect Ratios
Audio Gain Control
Improved Support for External Audio Input Devices
Variable Microphone Positions
Tap for Photo
Support for Moondog Labs Anamorphic Adapter
Image Edit Adjustment Sliders (Exposure, Contrast, Saturation, Color Temperature)
Downsampling
Shareable Extensions
New Document Save and Transfer Options

FiLMiC Pro is the gold standard for iPhone videography.


Features include:
-Targeted Focus Pulls
-Variable Speed Zoom
-Sync Audio Frame Rates of 24,25, 30, 48 and 50 fps. (on newer devices)
-High Speed Frame Rates of 60,120,240 fps (hardware dependent)
-Standard, Manual and Hybrid shooting modes. A shooting style for whatever your level.
-Up to a dozen different resolutions and aspect ratios including
Cinemascope (2.59:1)
Super 35 (2.35:1)
Letterbox (2.20:1)
Super 16 (1.66:1)
16:9 (2K,1080,720, 540)
17:9 Digitaal Cinema Initative (2K)
-Uncompressed or COmpressed audio (ACC or Linear PCM)
-44.1, 48.0 or 96.0khz
-Audio metering
-Audio Gain Control
-Headphone monitoring
-Stereo recording support
-Support for External Microphone Levels (Disable AGC)
-Customizable saved personal presets
-Aspect ratio overlays (2.35:1, 4:3, 16:9)
-Thirds guide for dynamic composition
-Tap Screen for Photo
-Square resolutions for Instagrammers
-iTunes File Sharing
-Infinitely expandable extensions for sharing, saving and archiving
-Support for 3rd Party 35mm adapters
-Support for the Moondog Labs Anamorphic Adapter (2.40:1)
-4 variable bitrate options per resolution, including FiLMiC Extreme;

4 Variable Bit Video Encoding Rates to make your footage either last the longest or look the absolute best under all post and color grading conditions:

FiLMiC Extreme
FiLMiC Quality
Apple Standard
Economy

FiLMiC Extreme offers 50mbps encoding at 1080p.

INSTANTLY SHARE YOUR HD MOVIE 
through a variety of extension supported clients such as
-Facebook
-DropBox
-Vimeo
-And supported FTP and Webdav servers as well.

..and a whole lot more...


**Not all features available on older devices.

Cinegenix, LLC Website FiLMiC Pro Support
